scripts.copy-normalize-css: rm -rf apps/candle/priv/static/normalize; mkdir -p apps/candle/priv/static/normalize; cp -r ./node_modules/normalize.css/normalize.css apps/candle/priv/static/normalize
scripts.copy-font-awesome-data: rm -rf apps/candle/priv/static/font-awesome; mkdir -p apps/candle/priv/static/font-awesome; cp -r ./node_modules/font-awesome/css apps/candle/priv/static/font-awesome; cp -r ./node_modules/font-awesome/fonts apps/candle/priv/static/font-awesome
scripts.copy-mapbox-data: rm -rf apps/candle/priv/static/mapbox; mkdir -p apps/candle/priv/static/mapbox; cp -r ./node_modules/mapbox-gl/dist/ apps/candle/priv/static/mapbox/
scripts.build-browserify: rm -rf apps/candle/priv/static/js; mkdir -p apps/candle/priv/static/js; ./node_modules/.bin/browserify apps/candle/web/static/ts/main.ts -p [ tsify ] > apps/candle/priv/static/js/main.js
scripts.watch-browserify: rm -rf apps/candle/priv/static/js; mkdir -p apps/candle/priv/static/js; watchify apps/candle/web/static/ts/main.ts -p [ tsify ] -o apps/candle/priv/static/js/main.js -dv
scripts.copy-css: rm -rf apps/candle/priv/static/css; mkdir -p apps/candle/priv/static/css; cp apps/candle/web/static/css/base.* apps/candle/priv/static/css
scripts.build-css: sass apps/candle/web/static/css/base.scss apps/candle/web/static/css/base.css && npm run copy-css
scripts.build: npm run build-browserify & npm run build-css & npm run build-assets & npm run copy-mapbox-data & npm run copy-font-awesome-data & npm run copy-normalize-css
scripts.watch: npm run watch-browserify & npm run watch-css & npm run watch-assets & npm run copy-mapbox-data & npm run copy-font-awesome-data & npm run copy-normalize-css
scripts.deploy: rm -rf apps/candle/priv/static && mkdir -p apps/candle/priv/static && npm run build-browserify && npm run build-css && npm run build-assets && npm run copy-mapbox-data && npm run copy-font-awesome-data && npm run copy-normalize-css
